Key Match Events: Clement Mzize scored an own goal in the 53rd minute
Arthur Masuaku hit the bar with a free-kick late in the second half
Post-Match Reflections: The result leaves Tanzania needing a positive result in their next match to keep their qualification hopes alive
Miscellaneous Highlights: DR Congo maintained their perfect record in Group H of the Africa Cup of Nations qualifier
Tanzania remains in second place with four points
Others: The match was a tense affair, with Tanzania creating chances but failing to convert
